backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing products, orders, user profiles, and access-controlled admin/user APIs with initial shop setup.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two error-handling features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files including global styles, routing, UI components, and shop logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables for the theme system.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.

frontend/src/api/authHooks.ts: Fetches admin status using actor identity with React Query.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines centralized query keys for products, orders, and admin checks.
frontend/src/api/shopHooks.ts: React Query hooks for public product browsing and order creation with storefront error sanitization.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in CartProvider with shared layout.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Displays cart line items and subtotal formatted in INR with a summary layout.

frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, quick links, contact text, and a dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Displays the main header with navigation, cart, mobile menu, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Shows a product card with image handling, price, stock info, and add-to-cart functionality.
Formats product description text into paragraphs or key-value rows.
Renders a responsive grid of ProductCard components or a fallback when empty.
Provides a main image viewer with thumbnails and fallback handling for failed images.

frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines a centralized config object and interface for all site marketing copy, navigation labels, and page text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders the About and Contact sections using site content with styled layout and contact card.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and publishing products with identity and access checks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart contents, quantity controls, and an emptyâ€‘state message using cart context.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays products for a selected category using a grid and handles loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements checkout flow with form validation, order submission, success screen, and cart clearing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders homepage with hero content, featured products logic, and admin-aware empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info, image gallery, stock status, and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Provides product browsing with category filtering, search, and state-managed product loading.
frontend/src/store/cart.ts: Defines cart state structure and utility functions for modifying and persisting the cart.
frontend/src/store/CartProvider.tsx: React context wrapper managing cart state, persistence, and update utilities.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility for formatting numeric values as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Maps product IDs to image filenames and builds base-path-aware URLs, providing utilities to fetch full image lists or the primary image.
frontend/src/utils/storefrontErrorSaniti: Detects replica and stopped-canister errors and converts them into simplified user-friendly messages, with a wrapper to auto-sanitize async calls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash/query-based routing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and loads typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Captures the project's state, issues, features, and deployment notes for The Lens storefront, including ongoing image and backend errors.
